entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023
